title: ammaa raavamma
sahitya:
amma! rAvamma, tulasamma nanu pAlimpu mamma! 
satatamu padamulE namminAnamma || 

(amma)







anupallavi







nemmadini nI vihaparammulOsagudu vanucu kamma viltuni tandri galanaina bAyadaTa
(amma)







caraNam







nI mrdu tanuvunu gani nI parimalamunu gani nI mahatvamunu gani nIrajAkSi ||

tAmarasa daLa nEtrudu tyAgarAjuni mitruDu prEmatO Siramunanu peTTu konnAdaTa ||



(amma)
